newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesia Feb forex reserves reach $19.862 billion.
newsitem.headline: Indonesia Feb forex reserves reach $19.862 billion.

text.p: Indonesia's foreign exchange reserves rose to $19.862 billion at the end of February from $19.830 billion at the end of January, a government official said on Friday.
"Indonesia's foreign reserves have risen to $19.862 billion in February," the official told Reuters.
The country's foreign exchange reserves totalled $19.125 billion in December and $17.825 billion in November.
